pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ariṭṭhassa nāma bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.3: “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.5: “ariṭṭhassa kira nāma bhikkhuno gaddhabādhipubbassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.6: ‘tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.7: Atha kho te bhikkhū yena ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.9: “saccaṃ kira te, āvuso ariṭṭha, evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.10: ‘tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā’”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.11: “Evaṃ byā kho ahaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.12: ‘yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.17: Anekapariyāyenāvuso ariṭṭha, antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.19: Appassādā kāmā vuttā bhagavatā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.20: Aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā kāmā vuttā bhagavatā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.29: sappasirūpamā kāmā vuttā bhagavatā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.30: Evampi kho ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo tehi bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ thāmasā parāmāsā abhinivissa voharati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.31: “evaṃ byā kho ahaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.32: ‘yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.33: Yato ca kho te bhikkhū nāsakkhiṃsu ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ etasmā pāpakā diṭṭhigatā vivecetuṃ, atha kho te bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.35: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.36: “saccaṃ kira te, ariṭṭha, evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.37: ‘tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā’”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.38: “Evaṃ byā kho ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.39: ‘yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.40: Kassa nu kho nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, mayā evaṃ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsi?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.41: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.43: Appassādā kāmā vuttā mayā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.53: sappasirūpamā kāmā vuttā mayā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.54: Atha ca pana tvaṃ, moghapurisa, attanā duggahitena amhe ceva abbhācikkhasi, attānañca khaṇasi, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.55: Tañhi te, moghapurisa, bhavissati dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.56: Netaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.57: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.59: ‘tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā’ti so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo—‘
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.60: māyasmā evaṃ avaca, mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi, na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ, na hi bhagavā evaṃ vadeyya, anekapariyāyenāvuso, antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā, alañca pana te paṭisevato antarāyāyā’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.61: Evañca so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.62: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamāno taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce paṭinissajjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.1.7: “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.1.12: Ye passanti ye suṇanti tehi vattabbo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.1.13: “māyasmā evaṃ avaca, mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi, na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ, na hi bhagavā evaṃ vadeyya, anekapariyāyenāvuso antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.1.21: “māyasmā evaṃ avaca, mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi, na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ, na hi bhagavā evaṃ vadeyya, anekapariyāyenāvuso antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.1.31: Itthannāmassa bhikkhuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.1.32: “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.1.34: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ samanubhāseyya—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.1.38: Itthannāmassa bhikkhuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.1.39: “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.1.41: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ samanubhāsati tassā diṭṭhiyā paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.1.42: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā, tassā diṭṭhiyā paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.1.47: Itthannāmassa bhikkhuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.1.48: “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi yathā yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.1.50: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ samanubhāsati tassā diṭṭhiyā paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.1.51: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno samanubhāsanā, tassā diṭṭhiyā paṭinissaggāya, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.1.53: Samanubhaṭṭho saṃghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, tassā diṭṭhiyā paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.1.54: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.2.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.2.2: Dhammakamme vematiko na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:2.2.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
